secret_key.label: Secret Key
secret_key.comment: Your secret key (get from your Building Dashboard)

base_url.label: Base URL
base_url.comment: eg. http://simicart.com/, leave it blank if you want to use default value from Building Dashboard

cms_shipping_condition.label: Show CMS content in product detail
cms_shipping_condition.comment: Please enter its CMS ID SimiCart Connector/CMS

is_reload_payment_method.label: Update order review when select payment method

is_show_sample_data.label: Show Sample Data on Home Screen

upload_pem_file.label: Upload Apple PEM file
upload_pem_file.comment: Android for Apple Device Notification Sending

android_app_key.label: Android App Key
android_app_key.comment: App Key for Android Notification Sending

android_secret_key.label: Android Secret Key
android_secret_key.comment: Secret Key for Android Notification Sending

noti_price_enable.label: Send notification to all users when price of product is changed

noti_new_product_separator.label: Send Notification when there's a new product

new_product_enable.label: Send notification to all users when there's a new product

noti_purchase_enable.label: Send notification to a customer when he/she finish purchasing

email.label: Email
email.comment: Used to send email. Seperate emails with comma.

phone.label: Phone Number
phone.comment: Used to call. Seperate phone numbers with comma

message.label: Message Number
message.comment: Used to send message. Seperate phone numbers with comma

website.label: Website Url
website.comment: Please enter the URL with http or https. For example: http://yourwebsite.com or https://yourwebsite.com

icon_color.label: Icon Color
icon_color.comment: Select the color of contact icons displayed in Contact page of your app.

pattern.label: Barcode pattern
pattern.comment:
Enter the pattern you want to generate barcodes. For Example:
[A.8] : 8 alpha
[N.4] : 4 numeric
[AN.6] : 6 alphanumeric
BAR[A.4][AN.6] : BARADFA12NF0O

qrcode_pattern.label: QR code pattern
qrcode_pattern.comment:
Enter the pattern you want to generate QR codes. For Example:
[A.8] : 8 alpha
[N.4] : 4 numeric
[AN.6] : 6 alphanumeric
QR[A.4][AN.6] : QRADFA12NF0O

sharing_message.label: Message For Sharing Wishlist
sharing_message.comment: The message is used when customers share their wishlist on Facebook, Twitter, Emails... It appears before Wishlist URL.

product_sharing_message.label: Message For Sharing Product
product_sharing_message.comment: The message is used when customers share a product in their wishlist on Facebook, Twitter, Emails... It appears before the product URL.
